author: schor
msg: [UIMA-3072] do the same changes here as done for the parent-pom in v 6-snapshot, since this plugin's parent is v5 (in order to make release work).  Remove the pre-compile approach - not needed.

author: brane
msg: Minor fixes in the C++HL APR wrappers.
(Array::Array): Do not make copy constructors explicit.
(ConstArray::ConstArray): Do not make copy constructors explicit.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-3072] add phase for descriptor mojo, and set skiperror flag for no annotations found to let helpmojo create the java code.

msg: HADOOP-9432 Add support for markdown .md files in site documentation
